column2: appellant, in his dock statement stated that on 21.11.2004  he was patrolling
the  areas  of  Biyagama,  Sapugaskanda,  Waduwegama  and  Siyambalape  with
RPC  Pradeep  in a  private vehicle  bearing No.  65  - 8621  and  had  thereafter
visited  the garage in which he had put his own vehicle for repairs at 11.30

column1: a.m.  Then he went on to  inspect the perimeters of the Biyagama Investment

column2: maintained at the police post of the said Zone.
